1.0.name: wordpress/publish-2-pingfm
1.0.description: Publish 2 PingFM allows you to automatically publish your posts to the Ping.fm service. This plugins allows you to : * select for witch category you want to publish your posts to ping.fm * select a different publishing template for each category * select, for each category, if you want to publish posts updates or not * select, for each category, a different template for post updates than for initial publishing * shorten posts URL using bit.ly shortening service

1.1.name: wordpress/publish-2-pingfm
1.1.description: Publish 2 PingFM allows you to automatically publish your posts to the Ping.fm service. This plugins allows you to : * select for witch category you want to publish your posts to ping.fm * select a different publishing template for each category * select, for each category, if you want to publish posts updates or not * select, for each category, a different template for post updates than for initial publishing * shorten posts URL using bit.ly shortening service
